sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM,EMP,POSITION,OFFICE,LV,NAME,PHONE,EMAIL,ACTIVATED,HOSPITAL_CODE FROM( SELECT E.EMP_NUM AS EMP, C1.CODE_NAME AS POSITION,C2.CODE_NAME AS OFFICE,C3.CODE_NAME AS LV, EMP_NAME AS NAME,E.PHONE,E.EMAIL,ACTIVATED, E.HOSPITAL_CODE FROM EMP E LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM CODEDATA WHERE BIG='8')C1 ON E.POSITION_CODE = C1.SMALL LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM CODEDATA WHERE BIG='9')C2 ON E.OFFICE_CODE = C2.SMALL LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM CODEDATA WHERE BIG='10')C3 ON E.LV_CODE = C3.SMALL WHERE 1=1 AND HOSPITAL_CODE = #HOSPITAL_CODE# ORDER BY EMP ASC)) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #start# AND #end#

SELECT TO_CHAR(OPEN,'HH24:MI') AS OPEN, TO_CHAR(CLOSE,'HH24:MI') AS CLOSE, TO_CHAR(WEEK_CLOSE,'HH24:MI') AS WEEK, SAT_OPEN AS SAT, SUN_OPEN AS SUN, TO_CHAR(LUNCH_OPEN,'HH24:MI')||' ~ '||TO_CHAR(LUNCH_CLOSE,'HH24:MI') AS LUNCH, TO_CHAR(RES_TIME,'MI')||'ë¶„' AS RESTIME FROM HOSPITAL_OPT WHERE HOSPITAL_CODE = #HOSPITAL_CODE#

SELECT TO_CHAR(OPEN,'HH24')AS OPEN, TO_CHAR(OPEN,'MI')AS OPEN2, TO_CHAR(CLOSE,'HH24')AS CLOSE, TO_CHAR(CLOSE,'MI')AS CLOSE2, TO_CHAR(WEEK_CLOSE,'HH24')AS WEEK, TO_CHAR(WEEK_CLOSE,'MI')AS WEEK2, SAT_OPEN AS SAT, SUN_OPEN AS SUN, TO_CHAR(LUNCH_OPEN,'HH24')AS LUNCH1, TO_CHAR(LUNCH_OPEN,'MI')AS LUNCH2, TO_CHAR(LUNCH_CLOSE,'HH24')AS LUNCH3, TO_CHAR(LUNCH_CLOSE,'MI')AS LUNCH4, TO_CHAR(RES_TIME,'MI')AS RESTIME FROM HOSPITAL_OPT WHERE HOSPITAL_CODE = #HOSPITAL_CODE#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM EMP WHERE 1=1 AND EMP_NUM = #EMP_NUM# AND HOSPITAL_CODE = #HOSPITAL_CODE#
SELECT ACTIVATED FROM EMP WHERE 1=1 AND HOSPITAL_CODE = #HOSPITAL_CODE# AND EMP_NUM = #num#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE EMP SET ACTIVATED = #man_use# WHERE HOSPITAL_CODE = #HOSPITAL_CODE# AND EMP_NUM = #num#
UPDATE EMP SET PW = '0000' WHERE HOSPITAL_CODE = #HOSPITAL_CODE# AND EMP_NUM = #MAN_RESET#

UPDATE HOSPITAL_OPT SET OPEN = TO_DATE(#open1#||#open2#,'HH24MI'), CLOSE = TO_DATE(#close1#||#close2#,'HH24MI'), WEEK_CLOSE = TO_DATE(#week1#||#week2#,'HH24MI'), SAT_OPEN = #sat#, SUN_OPEN = #sun#, LUNCH_OPEN = TO_DATE(#lunch1#||#lunch2#,'HH24MI'), LUNCH_CLOSE = TO_DATE(#lunch3#||#lunch4#,'HH24MI'), RES_TIME = TO_DATE(#restime1#,'MI') WHERE HOSPITAL_CODE = #HOSPITAL_CODE#
